title: I'm a happy owner of the Pixel 5 - Except for the zoomed in wallpaper
content:
I'm really happy with the move to the Pixel 5 but I've an issue with the wallpaper.

I've always had a studio photos of my dog on a yellow background. It's always looked amazing on my Pixel 1 and Pixel 3. But even though I've cropped it to the correct size ( 1080 - 2340 ) it's off centre and zoomed in on the Pixel 5. Losing resolution and contrast as a result.

Is this a thing? Or am I making a mistake?



What I get:
